DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety Quadrivalent Influenza Virus Vaccine Healthy People Aged year 3 60.40 Subjects equally divide 2 group , include 3-17 year old 18-60 year old.Adult group first receive one dose Quadrivalent Influenza Virus Vaccine.Then minor group also receive one dose Quadrivalent Influenza Virus Vaccine 7 day .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Quadrivalent Influenza Virus Vaccine Healthy People Aged 3 Years Older
